hints.content:
The first step in subdivision is a split step, which adds midpoints between each point. The first split step will result in points halfway between $AB$, $BC$, $CD$ and $DA$.

![Image of a single split step](https://ka-perseus-images.s3.amazonaws.com/780ab24f3d29cc82766cbf035d2d336e1b37c397.png)
All of the points in the final shape lie on the control polygon, so each point can only be the result of an average of two points.
In the final shape, the points all appear to be halfway between the points from the split image. So the weighting used must have been $1, 1$.
